text: Rocco Žiković (born 21 January b 2005 in Pula) is a Croatian footballer. He plays as defender for the Austrian Second League club FC Liefering. ==Career== Žiković started his career at NK Funtana. In February 2017 he moved to NK Istra 1961. In January 2021 he moved to Austria to the FC Red Bull Salzburg academy. There he played for the U16 and U18 team. In October 2022 he played his first league match for FC Liefering . He came as a substitute for Marcel Moswitzer in the 59th minute against Floridsdorfer AC . ==International== Žiković made his debut for a Croatia youth national team in October 2019. He made four appearances for the U-17 team between August 2020 and October 2021. In March 2022 he made his debut in the U-18 team. title: Rocco Zikovic
